009package imagingbook.common.image;
010
011import ij.process.Blitter;
012import ij.process.ImageProcessor;
013
014/**
015 * This class defines static methods for non-destructive, arithmetic operations on ImageJ's 
016 * {@link ImageProcessor} objects.
017 * Unlike the built-in {@link ImageProcessor} methods, the methods below
018 * return new images and keep the original images unmodified.
019 * 
020 * @version 2013/08/23: static methods converted to use generics.
021 */
022public abstract class ImageMath {
023        
024        public static <T extends ImageProcessor> T abs(T ip) {
025                @SuppressWarnings("unchecked")
026                T ip2 = (T) ip.duplicate();
027                ip2.abs();
028                return ip2;
029        }
030        
031        public static <T extends ImageProcessor> T sqr(T ip) {
032                @SuppressWarnings("unchecked")
033                T ip2 = (T) ip.duplicate();
034                ip2.sqr();
035                return ip2;
036        }
037        
038        public static <T extends ImageProcessor> T sqrt(T ip) {
039                @SuppressWarnings("unchecked")
040                T ip2 = (T) ip.duplicate();
041                ip2.sqrt();
042                return ip2;
043        }
044        
045        public static<T extends ImageProcessor> T add(T ip1, T ip2) {
046                @SuppressWarnings("unchecked")
047                T ip3 = (T) ip1.duplicate();
048                ip3.copyBits(ip2, 0, 0, Blitter.ADD);
049                return ip3;
050        }
051        
052        public static<T extends ImageProcessor> T mult(T ip1, T ip2) {
053                @SuppressWarnings("unchecked")
054                T ip3 = (T) ip1.duplicate();
055                ip3.copyBits(ip2, 0, 0, Blitter.MULTIPLY);
056                return ip3;
057        }
058
059}
